newsitem.title: ROMANIA: Bucharest bourse prices slightly down.
newsitem.headline: Bucharest bourse prices slightly down.

text.p: Bucharest's stock market fell slightly on Monday as in vestors maintained a wait-and-see mood, traders said.
"It's clear that most investors are waiting for better prices. Many view present prices as too high," one broker said.
The average price of 13 of the 51 traded stocks climbed, 25 fell and five remained unchanged. Six companies had no trade and two were suspended.
On the first tier, all but one of eight listings lost on their average prices. Azomures SA closed 50 lei stronger at 3,750 lei.
Three independent market indices, the VAB, the BIG and the CAS-SE, based on average prices and market capitalisation, slipped by 2.2, 2.0 and 2.2 percent respectively from last Friday.
"We are witnessing a downward trend of the market because there is no potential for profit-taking," a broker said.
Total volume was 1.97 million shares, slighlty up from last Friday's 1.96 million, while turnover slipped to 7.94 billion lei from 7.96 in the previous session.
JULY 28 JULY 25 Week's change 1997 high 1997 low
